data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3326176,"name":"Faruk","username":"Farukyl","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/f/e36b37/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-06T21:25:56.563Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eOur robot is currently divided into 2 main systems. We rebuilt our electronic system from scratch. We use SparkMax controllers communicating via the CanBus system. The communication system progresses as follows: 1 → 2 → 3 → 4 → 5 → 6. While the first 4 controllers belong to the chassis, the other two operate the other two systems.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eDespite having no software issues, we are unable to get our chassis to function properly. We upload timed-based code to our robot, but the code may not function correctly. After turning the robot off and on again, we load the same code, and the only change is the robot being restarted; however, in this case, the code starts working. Randomly, sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn’t. Nevertheless, we are unable to run any code written in the command-based structure.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eWe tested our controllers individually for debugging. When run individually, they cause issues with the chassis, and when run in the quadruple chassis configuration, we can encounter errors. Do you have any information about the possible source of this problem? Thank you in advance for your assistance.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2024-03-06T21:25:56.563Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":16,"reads":39,"readers_count":38,"score":87.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":457619,"topic_slug":"our-robot-is-not-functioning-properly-in-a-peculiar-way","display_username":"Faruk","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":64836,"hidden":false,"trust_level":0,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/our-robot-is-not-functioning-properly-in-a-peculiar-way/457619/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3549801,"name":"system","username":"system","avatar_template":"/uploads/default/original/4X/9/3/2/93234578e69f55873c63fc00fe2d0d85f23bce55.png","created_at":"2025-03-06T21:26:51.146Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThis topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply.
